name: Dead Sunset (Demo)
description:
This is the DEMO version and the full version will be coming to both Itch.io and Steam by Fall of 2022

*All sounds used in the game are royalty-free*

STORY:

It’s the end of the world. What can you do to survive?

As the zombie apocalypse ensues, you must fight and get your way to safety.

GAMEPLAY:

(Please use Headphones)

This is a Third Person and First Person Horror / Shooter game combo, YOU CHOOSE!

Very Few Jump scares and a few Chase Scenes (don't get caught)

  • WASD to move
  • Left CTRL for a flashlight (you already have it)
  • Press E to Interact
  • Shift to Run (When the game allows you to run)
  • Right Mouse to Zoom or Aim
  • LMB to melee attack or shoot.

Known Bugs:

  • Pressing escape mid-game will close the game.
  • Pressing the Z button will trigger / toggle ragdoll.
  • Unsynchronized cutscenes (fixes will be provided soon)

A WORD FROM THE DEVELOPER:

I am far from a professional Game Developer, I hardly know what I am doing, so don't expect the game to be perfect in any way. 

That said I do enjoy trying to put together these small Horror projects, as I am a very big horror fan myself.

I use Unreal Engine 4 for my projects. (have not dived into UE5 yet) 

Let me know in the comments what you think if you decide to pick up this game.

Thanks for checking it out. Hope you will enjoy it.

John 

(DistractionStudios / Solo Developer)
